div.p: Family background... I’m in a family of 7 I only really know 5 of the 7 the other two were adopted; my mother was a drug addict,
violent, wasn’t very responsible, you know, and by the Year 2000 we were moved out permanently, we were in and out a lot before then
but by 2000 we were moved out and we were separated and put into different places so that’s as far as like with my family that I know
and then personally I’ve been in and out of different homes since that year so but yeah that’s pretty much it.
There was a couple of a significant families I think so when I was 14 I moved with a family in Barnwood, they were very good, I think they were
the kind of family that were very patient with me so you know that taught me to be patient. The other significant family would be
the one that I’ve been living with from 6th Form up to now and you know they’ve just been there every step of the way so yeah.
My guardian, my foster mum, well I just call her mum because it’s easier, she’s a teacher, she’s a primary school teacher and has set up a nursery recently
and her partner is a social worker. Well before being in care the fact that we were living in the conditions that we were living in
I just didn’t want to be anything like that whatsoever, you can have a good lifestyle, a good way to live and you don’t have to be like the people
